::KitKat::

She watched Megatron walk in just as she was going to escort 
Apocolypse out of the room.  She looked up at Megatron. "You don't 
have to yell. I can hear you just fine." She was backing up as 
Megatron walked in. She knew that she was no muscle match against 
him. She looked at Apocoplyse, then to Megatron. "What is it that you 
wish to talk to me about?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Megatron marched down the corridor, with Kitkat on his scopes. 
She had 
> just exited the meeting with Apocolypse, and he wanted answers. 
Most of all, 
> he wanted to know who she thought she was, sneaking around like 
this.
>     "Kitkat, I want to talk with you. NOW. Thats right, now." He 
demanded and 
> pointed back into the conference room.
